Subskills.name: High Voltage Shock
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by static shock.

Subskills.name: Uprising Charge
Subskills.description: Decreases the cooldown of static shock.

Subskills.name: Self Ionization
Subskills.description: Static shock follows you with increased duration inflicting statick shock to nearby monsters.

Subskills.name: Field of Shock
Subskills.description: Increases the area of effect radius of static shock.

Subskills.name: Initial Zap
Subskills.description: Static shock shocks monsters with an initial hit dealing increased damage.

Subskills.name: Multishock
Subskills.description: Chance on cast to unleash an additional static shock.

Subskills.name: Storms Reach
Subskills.description: Increases the maximum cast range of static shock.

Subskills.name: Storm Infused Vains
Subskills.description: Increases the tick frequency of static shock.

Subskills.name: Ultimate Static Current
Subskills.description: Chance on tick to unleash a lightning surge towards the target.

Subskills.name: Lingering Electricity
Subskills.description: Increases the duration of static shock.

Subskills.name: Charged Shock
Subskills.description: Chance on cast to increase the damage dealt by static shock.

Subskills.name: Leeching Shock
Subskills.description: Chance on tick to restore a portion of your maximum mana dealing increased damage and stunning the target.

Subskills.name: Thunders Embrace
Subskills.description: Increases the area of effect radius inflicting stasis on hit.
